NAME: Your name...
DRIVERINSTALLATIONINSTRUCTIONS: You will get two popups to install the USB driver. Click 'Yes' and then 'Install'.
CONNECTIONINSTRUCTIONS: No connected robot found. Connect a Leaphy robot and try again.
CREDITS_INTRODUCTION: EASYBLOQS is an educational open source product of the Leaphy foundation
INFO_INTRO: The Leaphy foundation wants to make robotics accessible to every student. Do you want to help us? Please! This can be done by helping to develop the software.
INFO_OPEN_SOURCE: Do you want to make your own software based on the source code? We think it is important that you match the style of the Leaphy foundation: collaboration, sharing knowledge and making it accessible to others. In this way we open doors to the digital world. And so you show your appreciation for all the work that our volunteers have put into Easybloqs.
INFO_THANKS: Thanks for your support and keep making beautiful things!
EDITORCHANGEINSTRUCTIONS: You have unsaved changes. If you go to the block-editor now, they will be lost.
NOT_IN_SYNC: Robot not in sync, please reconnect
SIGNATURE_MISMATCH: Signature mismatch, are you sure this is the right Robot?
NO_SERIAL_SUPPORT: No web serial supported on your browser, look at the upload issue page for more information
FEEDBACK_SENT: Your feedback has been sent, thank you!
AI_RATE_LIMITED: The explanation robot is a little too busy right now, please try again later.
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED: The browser you are using doesn't support web-serial or web-usb.
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_1: You won't be able to upload your code.
BROWSER_NOT_SUPPORTED_SUGGESTION: A chromium based browser should work (Edge/Chrome/Brave)
INVALID_ROBOT: The detected board {board} does not work with the installed extension {extension}!
CLEAR_PROJECT_DESC: Selecting this robot will clear your project, are you sure?
DRIVER_INSTALL_TEXT: Please follow the steps in the instruction video below to install the drivers.
INVALID_WORKSPACE_MESSAGE: That doesn't look like a Leaphy Project, please verify that you have selected the correct file
UNDEFINED_ROBOT_MESSAGE: This does seem like a valid Leaphy Project, but the robot type was not included in the name, we've kept your previous robot selection for now.
ROBOT_RESERVED_MESSAGE: It appears that we're unable to connect to the robot, the port might be in use by another program or another tab
RECORDING_DESCRIPTION:
This version of Leaphy EasyBloqs will record your screen for use by an external party for the project {project}, by continuing you are automatically agreeing to this.

To disable recordings, you may visit our regular site.

Please enter your name to continue
SUBMISSIONS_CLOSED_DESCRIPTION: The submissions for this project are closed, please use the regular site for Leaphy EasyBloqs to continue building
PROJECT_INVALID_USERNAME: Username should be at least 3 characters long
NO_PARTICIPANTS: No users found, please ask your administrator to create them
CONFIRMSUBMIT_MESSAGE: You won't be able to edit your work later
GRADING: Our AI is deciding your fate...
AUTOGRADING_PASSED_DESC: Congrats on completing the assignments sucessfully
CONTINUE_WORKING_DESC: Continue where you left off by selecting a recent project
NO_INTERNET: No internet, please check your connection
ML_CLEAR_DATASETS: This will clear your current datasets, Are you sure you want to continue?
ML_PREPARE_DESC: Set up your sensors and upload the training program to your robot
ML_NO_SENSORS: No sensors have been added yet
ML_NOT_CONNECTED_DESC: Please connect to your robot over Bluetooth
ML_COLLECT_DESC: Bind classes to your keyboard and show the robot what it needs to do
ML_RECORDING: Press a key to record data
ML_TRAIN_DESC: Let's train your model and get it ready for deployment
ML_UPLOAD_DESC: Check your models performance and upload it to your robot
ML_MISSING_CLASSIFY_DESCRIPTION: Your project lacks the classify input block, please ensure that it exists and is inside a while true block
ML_NO_CLASSES_DESCRIPTION: You haven't created enough classes yet, please create at least two classes before continuing
ML_NO_SENSORS_DESCRIPTION: You haven't added any sensors, please add at least one sensor before uploading to your robot
FIRMWARE_NO_CONNECTION: A board must be connected to your computer, and a connection has to be established.
FIRMWARE_CANCEL_BUTTON: You cancelled the flashing process. Feel free to close this window.
FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: The image-file for the selected firmware is currently being downloaded.
FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD_FAILED_RESPONSE: Downloading the firmware failed, since the destination server did not respond with the expected data.
FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD_FAILED_OTHER: Downloading the firmware failed, since the destination URL could not be reached.
FIRMWARE_CANCELLED: Because the window was closed, the flashing process was cancelled.
FIRMWARE_FLASHING_FAILED: An error occurred while flashing the firmware.
FIRMWARE_NO_USB_CONNECTION: In order to start the flashing process, the board must be connected in a specific way. Please try again, and select the board in the pop-up.
FIRMWARE_FLASH_MESSAGE: The firmware is currently being flashed to the board.
FIRMWARE_FINAL_WARNING:
You are about to install the firmware on your board.
Are you certain you selected the right board and firmware?
FIRMWARE_STATE_ERROR: The flashing process could not continue for the following reason:
NO_PROGRAM_MESSAGE: We couldn't find any code on your robot
PROGRAM_STORED_DESCRIPTION: This program was stored when you previously used this robot
BLUETOOTH_CONTROL_DESCRIPTION: Use your keyboard to control your robot
NO_BLUETOOTH_MESSAGE: Bluetooth not found, please check if you're using a Chromium based browser, on Linux please enable chrome://flags/#enable-web-bluetooth
EXTENSIONS_CONNECT_DESC: Please connect your robot to your computer to find the available extensions
LISTS_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Store multiple similar objects into a list of data
OPERATORS_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Add blocks for handling both strings and numbers
ML_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Train your own Machine Learning model for classification
MESH_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Connect a network of robots together and make them communicate
BLE_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Control your robot using your keyboard remotely
